Articles.Content: So I'm designing a small flying probe for use on heavy atmosphere planets/moon (eve,lythe etc.)So that when science zones(really don't like the term biosphere) will be covered. Anyone else use aircraft probes? Also has anyone built a working and stable hovercraft? I can't seem to build one for the life of me.

A hovercraft uses trapped air to create a cushion. Given KSP's rudimentary aerodynamic model, I doubt it models trapped air flow. Or air flow at all, for that matter. I have seen VTOL crafts tho, you might have more success going that direction.
